Returns: A PendingResult which can be used to retrieve the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ when they are available. If @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#isSuccess_E@ returns true, it is recommended to check @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status#getStatusCode_E@, since two possible values are considered success: @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes#SUCCESS_E@ which means that the returned @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ is up to date, or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes#SUCCESS_CACHE_E@ which means that the returned @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ is a cached version, since the most up to date version could not be downloaded to the device (for example, due to connectivity).
Parameters: Describes the mode in which to open the file. Possible values are @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile#MODE_READ_ONLY_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile#MODE_READ_WRITE_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile#MODE_WRITE_ONLY_E@.
An optional listener that will announce progress as the file is downloaded. If you don't care about progress, provide null.
open(com.google.android.gms.common.api.G.Description: Opens the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ that are associated with this file for read and/or write. The returned file is a temporary copy available only to this app. The contents are returned when they are available on the device in their entirety. To listen for progress, provide a @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile#DownloadProgressListener_E@. The contents must be closed via @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents#commit_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents#discard_E@. Note: to open the file in edit mode, the user must have edit access. See @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#Metadata#isEditable_E@.
open(com.google.android.gms.common.api.G.FullName: public abstract PendingResult<DriveApi.DriveContentsResult> open (GoogleApiClient apiClient, int mode, DriveFile.DownloadProgressListener listener)

ClassDesc: A file in Drive. This class provides access to the contents and metadata of the specified file. To retrieve a DriveFile from a known drive id, use @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveApi#getFile_E@.
